name: Painty Mob
summary: Shake up your humdrum world by dousing its unsuspecting citizens with splashes of vibrant paint in an effort to spread a little unrequested cheer around to all. But make sure you stay one step ahead of the ever-increasing angry mob – they aren’t too happy about your rainbow-inspired vision and will stop at nothing to slow you down. Rack up more and more points by chaining together colorful combos and unlock helpful items, equipment, and companions to keep the paint flowing.
